snippet.title: MARIO + RABBIDS SPARKS OF HOPE: Game Introduction Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive into the lush world of Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope!
Mario + Rabbids® Sparks of Hope is now available for pre-order on: link pre-order page

The galaxy is in danger as Cursa plots to steal energy from the Sparks. Mario, the Rabbids and their friends step up to face the threat, and save them.

Lead your dream team of Heroes through luxurious worlds and discover each planet's curious inhabitants. 

Explore rich and peculiar worlds while unlocking all the secrets they have to offer and prove your bravery in action-packed battles.
Each enemy requires a specific set of skills to gain the upper hand as you fight in dynamic, tactical combat.

Build your own team by combining your favourite Heroes and Sparks. 
Throughout your journey forge new alliances with familiar faces and even the most unexpected allies.
Level up, build your strength and emerge victorious.


LEARN MORE ABOUT  MARIO + RABBIDS SPARKS OF HOPE ON: www.mariorabbids.com 

FOLLOW US ON: 
Instagram: www.mariorabbids.com/instagram 
Facebook: www.mariorabbids.com/facebook
Twitter: www.mariorabbids.com/twitter
Forums: www.mariorabbids.com/forums

----
0:00 Welcome to Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope
01:24 Explore new worlds 
02:14 Meet new allies
03:10 Discover a new combat style
4:56 Save the Sparks
05:28 Play soon!
